model.title: Justin Trudeau wins Canadian election with minority government

synopses.short: Voters take to the polls in the Canadian election
synopses.long: Justin Trudeau has been re-elected prime minister of Canada with a reduced share of the vote.Th BBC's Lyce Ducette reports.
synopses.medium: Justin Trudeau has been re-elected prime minister of Canada with a reduced share of the vote.

model.caption: Canada's general election took place on Monday 22 October
